resources.string:
Add forces by tapping and dragging outward from points

Add moments by long pressing at points

Remove an arrow or moment by dragging its arrow head back into itself

Change direction of a moment by dragging the arrow head clockwise or counterclockwise in a circle

Correct arrows turn from gray to black. Gray arrows must be removed

Press the "Check" button when finished
You cannot tap on the background and swipe inward toward the object to place an arrow, you must tap on the object (the edge of the wheel in this case) and swipe outward away from the object.\n\n
